main event: Object first observed as a bright object in the sky appeared to be a large balloon or blimp.
interesting points: The observation took place on 13 September 1953 between 1830 and 1902., The location of the sighting was Atherton, California., The object was estimated to be at a very high altitude of 30,000 ft or higher., The object was reported to be travelling in a westerly direction at an angle of approximately 33 degrees from the horizon., Three Project Blue Bag balloons were reported in the area at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: large balloon or blimp in the sky
witness description: Leonard Sherman of 14057 May Avenue, Atherton, California
